name: CMS_MU_INFO
description: This table holds information about Regulatory Group records, which are used to store information about configuration for regulatory reporting and attestation programs.

columns.name: CMS_MU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the CMS Meaningful Use Community Care Network (CCN) record.

columns.name: CMS_MU_NAME
columns.description: The name of the CMS Meaningful Use record.
